name: Hero Sprint Compass
description:
ALL THE CYCLE DETAILS

When you’re venturing into trails unknown, a compass shows you the way. And when you’re starting off your mountain biking adventures, the Hero Sprint Compass leads the way. Why? The New Ride Geometry makes it easier to control on any terrain, and the steel frame can totally take a beating. It’s time to conquer the summits! Powered by GEMTEC™.

name: Hero Sprint Cowboy
description:
ALL THE CYCLE DETAILS

What better way to enjoy the great outdoors than on two wheels? The Hero Sprint Cowboy is the right choice for you. This single-speed cycle, equipped with a V-brake system and rigid fork, is designed for those just starting their foray into the wild.

name: Miss India Gold
description:
ALL THE CYCLE DETAILS

Hero MI Gold is an elegant, strong and stylish bicycle for our independent, fearless women to rule the roads. Equipped with a comfort frame gemetry and caliper brakes, this bike ensures smooth and safe riding. All you women, time to reclaim the roads!

name: Hero Thorn 24 T
description:
ALL THECYCLE DETAILS

Redefine your mountain biking experience with the Hero Sprint Thorn, a cycle that’s inspired by thrill seekers who forever seek to scale the summit. With its rugged build, this MTB can handle whatever terrain you throw at it. So go ahead and explore those new trails - with the Hero Thorn, you're guaranteed a smooth ride.

name: Hero Spring Dale 26T
description:
ALL THECYCLE DETAILS

Resilient and powerful, she's Springdale: a women's cycle inspired by strong, independent women who know how to get what they want. Featuring a low-step frame and durable build, this cycle is designed to withstand whatever life throws your way.

name: Hero Sprint Hustle
description:
ALL THECYCLE DETAILS

Life is a hustle. But with the Hero Sprint Hustle, you can make it infinitely better. Equipped with SPUR suspensions, a mechanical disc braking system, and the revolutionary GEMTEC™, your cruising experience is all set to reach its absolute pinnacle. Hustle hard, this cycle has got your back!

name: CAYA Color Run 20
description:
The adventure has begun! Caya’s Color Run 20” kid’s bike is lightweight and easy to maneuver so your little rider can concentrate on building their confidence, skills, and sense of daring. Color run is a comfortable, lightweight, long-lasting and strong steel frame design with an upright riding position. It comes with reliable power brakes which will give control over the bike for a safe and confident ride. Equipped with high quality rust-free alloy rims and off-road tyres create traction and smooths out bumps so your kid can build confidence. It has a quick release clip for seat height adjustment to ensure comfort and perfect sizing.
It’s attractive paint job, a superior color coordinated saddle and water decals makes it a perfect ride for your little ones.

name: CHAMP 20T
description:
• Champ - a short for champion, whose vision and dreams are so big that they will overcome any obstacle to achieve them. To quote tennis champion Chris Evert, “If you’re a champion, you have to have it in your heart”. Let your child live his heart out and ride like a Champ.
  • Ninety One cycles brings you the Champ, a single speed bike having life-long durability of MIG welded steel frame, the safety of power V-brakes, and the classy design of a full chain cover and color coordinated mud guards.

name: STARSHIP 20T
description: Introducing the Ninety One Starship that is designed for young dreamers, explorers and star chasers. The Starship bike has the durability of hi-tensile steel frame, hassle free rigid fork, safety and power of V brakes. The bright, non-toxic and dual colours of this bike along with an attractive full chainguard cover make it stand out among all other kid’s bikes. So let your child enjoy thrilling rides on his very own Starship.

name: Ralleyz X-One GT Palindrome 1.0
description:
ALL THECYCLE DETAILS

Redefine your mountain biking experience with the Hero Sprint Thorn, a cycle that’s inspired by thrill seekers who forever seek to scale the summit. With its rugged build, this MTB can handle whatever terrain you throw at it. So go ahead and explore those new trails - with the Hero Thorn, you're guaranteed a smooth ride.

name: RODEO 29
description:
• Tired of the same old boring bikes that always look the same? Not anymore as Ninety One introduces its Xtreme Series - 3.0" fat-tire hardtails to hit any trail. So hop on the VantageX as nothing in your path will ever be an obstacle.
  • Get outdoors, feel alive with this fat-tire beast on any terrain!

name: EX-STORM 29
description:
ALL THECYCLE DETAILS

Redefine your mountain biking experience with the Hero Sprint Thorn, a cycle that’s inspired by thrill seekers who forever seek to scale the summit. With its rugged build, this MTB can handle whatever terrain you throw at it. So go ahead and explore those new trails - with the Hero Thorn, you're guaranteed a smooth ride.

name: EX-TRAIL 29
description:
ALL THECYCLE DETAILS

Redefine your mountain biking experience with the Hero Sprint Thorn, a cycle that’s inspired by thrill seekers who forever seek to scale the summit. With its rugged build, this MTB can handle whatever terrain you throw at it. So go ahead and explore those new trails - with the Hero Thorn, you're guaranteed a smooth ride.

name: HURRICANE 29T
description: Better watch out, this bike will rock you like a hurricane! The Hurricane 29T is a force to reckon with. This single speed bike is a tough competitor with its hi-tensile steel frame, powerful disc brakes and hi-traction 2.4" wide tires.

name: Hero Attitude
description:
ALL THECYCLE DETAILS

Showcase your never-say-never outlook with the Hero Attitude. A trailblazer in the literal sense, this mountain bike is built with a unique MTB geometry and has a hi-tensile steel frame to take on the hazards of the trails.

name: Hero Sprint Milano
description:
ALL THECYCLE DETAILS

Get fit. Go fast. Have fun! You can do it all when you’re on a Hero Sprint Milano. Whether you’re looking to get a workout in, cruise around the city, or just have a good time, the Milano is the bike for you. It’s light and nimble, yet comfortable and capable, making it perfect for all types of riders. Powered by GEMTEC™.
